text:
Under "Catalina new features" is the following entry:

[B1] StandardHost:
     Added the workDir attribute to the Host configuration.
     This makes it easier to set the base directory where the work directories
     for application Context's are placed when virtual hosting sites 
     with Tomcat.

The word "Context's" is incorrect- it should be "contexts"
Since its been wrong this long, everyone will still understand what the intent was.
